projects.title: Face Recognition Attendance System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an automated attendance system using **Python**, **OpenCV**, and **Flask**.
- Achieved over 95% recognition accuracy for 50+ users.
- Integrated **MySQL** backend and dashboard to visualize daily attendance logs.

projects.title: AI-Driven Virtual Assistant
projects.bodyText:
- Created a voice-enabled desktop assistant using **Python** and **SpeechRecognition API**.
- Automated 20+ daily OS tasks including web search, app control, and reminders.
- Improved performance through multithreading for real-time interaction.

projects.title: SmartWatch AI: Live Stream Event Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Built a real-time CCTV monitoring system using **Django**, **OpenAI Vision API**, and **OpenCV** to detect events from live YouTube streams using natural-language prompts.
- Implemented RESTful APIs and asynchronous frame processing for efficient live analysis.
- Optimized frame sampling strategy, reducing inference cost by ~85% while maintaining detection accuracy.

projects.title: AI Portfolio Reviewer
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an AI-powered portfolio review tool using **Django** and **Selenium** to capture full-page screenshots of portfolio websites.
- Generated actionable UI/UX and content feedback using **Gemini/OpenAI** models.
- Implemented data persistence with **SQLite**, environment-based API key management, and optional cloud image storage.

projects.title: Health Care Data Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Analyzed healthcare records using **Python**, **Pandas**, and **Matplotlib** to uncover medical cost trends.
- Applied EDA and data visualization techniques to identify patient behavior insights.
- Generated actionable insights to optimize healthcare operations.

projects.title: Gym Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Built a **JavaScript + Node.js** application for managing gym memberships, trainers, and schedules.
- Implemented CRUD operations with **Express.js** and **MongoDB** backend.
- Designed responsive UI for admin and user dashboards.

projects.title: E-commerce Site
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a mini e-commerce web app using **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**.
- Implemented product listing, cart system, and checkout functionality.
- Focused on clean UI and responsive front-end architecture.

projects.title: Mutual Fund Analysis Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Created an analytical dashboard to visualize mutual fund performance and trends.
- Utilized **Pandas**, **Matplotlib**, and **Seaborn** for in-depth market analysis.
- Delivered KPIs for better investment decision-making.

projects.title: Banking Data Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Built a **Jupyter Notebook dashboard** analyzing banking transactions and trends.
- Highlighted customer segmentation and loan repayment patterns.
- Used **Matplotlib**, **Seaborn**, and **Pandas** for visualization.

projects.title: Road Accident Power BI Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Designed **Power BI** reports analyzing 50k+ accident records.
- Identified high-risk regions and visualized key safety metrics.
- Assisted data-driven policy planning for transportation safety.

projects.title: Vibe Code
projects.bodyText:
- Built a **TypeScript + React** full-stack app focused on collaborative coding and design themes.
- Implemented component-driven UI and modular architecture for scalability.
- Deployed with responsive layout and state management using **Redux Toolkit**.

projects.title: Medical Cost Prediction
projects.bodyText:
- Trained regression models on 1.3k+ patient records to predict medical expenses.
- Achieved 92% prediction accuracy using **Scikit-learn**.
- Enhanced model robustness with feature scaling and outlier removal.

projects.title: E-commerce Performance Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Visualized 10k+ sales records using **Power BI**, highlighting underperforming categories.
- Revealed insights that improved conversion strategy and customer segmentation.
- Designed interactive filters for management insights.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a simple console-based game in **Python**.
- Demonstrated logic building, condition handling, and user input validation.
- Great beginner project to showcase basic Python flow control.
